group_1.narration: I put all I had into defeating myself,@and pushed through the growing crowd.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, hey!
You're back!@I knew you could do it!
Shhhh…@Take a deep breath.
Ahhh, okay, I get it.@So that was "just" a moment for you.
You were gone a while.@About, hmm...five hours?
This is [textRed:the Mirror Witch's Mansion]...
And that was its Familiar you bumped into.
...That's right.@You got an invitation, didn't you?
It goes without saying, but you @got it from one of her Familiars.
The Mirror Witch...@She's luring Magical Girls here.
Didn't you think it was a little@strange to get an invitation?
Anyone would... @I mean it was thrown by a monster.
...But you came anyway,@because there might be a Witch...
Right?
That's what the Witch was hoping.@It's like a...what do you call it...
A pitcher plant!@...Wait, was that it?
Well, I guess it could be a @Venus flytrap or a doodlebug.
What I mean is, it draws you in, and @then...THWAP! Its jaws slam shut on you.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!@So you're saying this is a trap.

group_1.textLeft: ...Sort of.@This place is more complicated than that.
You just came out of that big @mirror over there a little while ago...

group_1.textRight: One of the ones facing each other...?

group_1.textLeft: There're dimensions inside those mirrors,@and you were inside one until a second ago.
We call them [textRed:Mirror Layers].
There are countless Mirror Layers in this @Labyrinth... That's why some call it...
[textRed:Endless Mirrors].
And deep, deep inside the Labyrinth....
...lies [textRed:the Mirror Witch]...
...Well that's what the rumor says, anyway.
Of course, you'd have to work your@way through all the enemies to get there.
Out of all those enemies, the most@dangerous ones are the copies...
You see... The Familiar that @attacked you, it took a mold of you.

group_1.textRight: A mold...? Like...for a figure...?@Or some sort of cake mold...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, yes! Exactly!
And now it's making a bunch of Iroha cakes.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100100:lipSynch_0](So that means...@That thing I just fought was...!)

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry! @They're just copies of you!
But it took its time making its mold of you.
So your copy is probably pretty high-quality.
When it rushes the copies aren't very good.
Besides, copy isn't really the right@word. Its personality is different, too...
...What's that face for?@You look like you've seen a ghost.
Wow, that was fast!@It must've made your copy right away!

group_1.textRight: So it wasn't an illusion...@I... I really fought myself...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, don't worry about it!@That's normal.
Everyone who enters this Mansion@gets a copy made of them...
I haven't heard of anyone NOT@meeting a copy of themselves.
Plus, they're just puppets made of magic.
It's best to take care of them quickly.
Just don't let your guard down.
Also, you might see some @copies of your friends too...
You'll be open to a sneak attack @if you're not paying attention.
So once you spot a fake,@let 'em have it, okay?

group_1.textRight: You're making it sound like I'm on a@mission to defeat the Mirror Witch...

group_1.textLeft: Well...aren't you?

group_1.textRight: No, I just... Um... Now that I've heard@about it, I'd like some time to prepare...

group_1.textLeft: Prepare...?@What do you have to prepare?

group_1.textRight: Well... It sounds like it could take time...@Shouldn't I take food...and water?

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* It's not a field trip…
...Okay, listen.@I'll give you a useful tip.
This is just what I heard, but...@The Mirror Witch has a secret.
A secret that's deeply@connected to Kamihama...
That's not all!@I should tell you why I'm here...
You'll get [textRed:Mirror Coins] when you@defeat enemies inside this Labyrinth.
They're a special coin that only @me, the Coordinator, deals in.
This is a pretty mysterious place.@There's a lot we don't know about it...
But this much is certain... If you give@me coins, I'll make it worth your while.
Do that, and you'll become an@even more powerful Magical Girl!
Yes, as the Coordinator, I guarantee it!
Sooo...@Will you give it a shot, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I will. Right then... @I should get going...!

group_1.textLeft: Great!@I knew you'd come around!
Now remember, this place is @separated into many Layers...
So just get in there and smash your@way through to the center of the Labyrinth.
And be sure to collect a @bunch of those Mirror Coins!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100100:lipSynch_0](...What's going on here...@Am I just being used?)
